text: Ángel Sergio Guerrero Mier (August 18, 1935 – January 10, 2021) was a Mexican politician and lawyer. He was a member of the Institutional Revolutionary Party. He was Governor of Durango between 1998 and 2004. Guerrero Mier died on January 10, 2021 in Durango, aged 85.Fallece Ángel Sergio Guerrero Mier, ex gobernador de Durango ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Mexican politicians Category:Mexican lawyers
title: Ángel Sergio Guerrero Mier
